(2,): As a system administrator, I want to configure logging settings, so that system activities are properly recorded and monitored As a notification manager, I want to send notifications to agencies, so that users are informed about important events
(4,): As a data submitter, I want to create a submission with a unique ID, agency, and status, so that I can track my data submissions As a submission manager, I want to update the publish status of a submission, so that the system reflects the current state of the submission As a FABS user, I want to create a FABS submission with flexible fields, so that I can include agency-specific data As a DABS user, I want to create a DABS submission with FPDS data, so that I can include contract-related information
(3,): As a user, I want to have role-based permissions, so that I can perform actions appropriate to my responsibilities As a UI designer, I want to update the UI design, so that users have an improved experience As a tester, I want to generate user test reports, so that I can track UI testing results As a file generator, I want to generate D files for submissions, so that users can download their submission files As a system validator, I want to validate file extensions, so that only allowed file types can be processed
(0,): As a validation manager, I want to add validation rules, so that submissions are checked against business requirements As a validation engine, I want to validate submissions against rules, so that data quality is maintained
(1,): As a data processor, I want to process data deletions, so that outdated information is removed from the system As a data manager, I want to sync D1 file generation with FPDS data, so that data remains consistent across systems As a historical data analyst, I want to load FABS data with required columns, so that I can perform historical analysis As a FPDS data user, I want to load FPDS data for specific years, so that I can access historical contract information
